channel.title: Hayes Warner on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Hayes Warner on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Hayes Warner Joins Ryan Murphy’s ‘The Shards’ at FX
item.description: Hayes Warner has joined Ryan Murphy’s adaptation of the Bret Easton Ellis novel “The Shards” as a series regular, Variety has confirmed. The FX thriller series also stars Kaia Gerber
